question: Which of the following was the son and successor of Vakataka ruler Vindhyashakti II/ Vindhyasena?
explanation: Pravarasena II was the son and successor of Vakataka ruler Vindhyashakti II/ Vindhyasena. Pravarsena II ruled for a period of fifteen years. He was followed by Devasena, who was a pleasure-seeking ruler.
